lead_paragraph: The widow of a man killed in last month’s terror attack in San Bernardino, Calif., has filed four claims against the county and is seeking damages totaling $58 million.

headline.print_headline: California: County Is Sued Over Terror Attack
headline.main: California: County Is Sued Over Massacre

snippet: The widow of a man killed in last month’s terror attack in San Bernardino, Calif., has filed four claims against the county and is seeking damages totaling $58 million.
abstract: Renee Wetzel, wife of Michael Wetzel, one of 14 people killed in San Bernardino, Calif, massacre, files lawsuit against county and seeks $58 million in damages; suit says his death was preventable and caused by negligent actions of respondents.
